text:
Hello everyone, i'm getting the following error with Storybook on a clean install from the repo:
<https://github.com/HubSpot/cms-react/tree/main/examples/graphql-storybook>

Did some digging but didn't find anything useful. Some have reported such issues with Storybook and vite in the below issues:
<https://github.com/storybookjs/storybook/issues/18920>
<https://github.com/storybookjs/builder-vite/issues/467>

My node.js version is: v20.17.0

Below is the error:
```ReferenceError: process is not defined
    at assertEach (<http://localhost:3123/@fs/home/misa/projects/cms-react/examples/graphql-storybook/gql-storybook-project/gql-storybook-app/node_modules/.cache/sb-vite/deps/@HubSpot_cms-dev-server_storybook.js?v=ec1e5a2c:4689:30>)
    at arrayOf (<http://localhost:3123/@fs/home/misa/projects/cms-react/examples/graphql-storybook/gql-storybook-project/gql-storybook-app/node_modules/.cache/sb-vite/deps/@HubSpot_cms-dev-server_storybook.js?v=ec1e5a2c:4680:46>)
    at node_modules/@babel/types/lib/definitions/core.js (<http://localhost:3123/@fs/home/misa/projects/cms-react/examples/graphql-storybook/gql-storybook-project/gql-storybook-app/node_modules/.cache/sb-vite/deps/@HubSpot_cms-dev-server_storybook.js?v=ec1e5a2c:4913:40>)
    at __require2 (<http://localhost:3123/@fs/home/misa/projects/cms-react/examples/graphql-storybook/gql-storybook-project/gql-storybook-app/node_modules/.cache/sb-vite/deps/chunk-62VDRKYJ.js?v=aa7aaf08:19:50>)
    at node_modules/@babel/types/lib/definitions/index.js (<http://localhost:3123/@fs/home/misa/projects/cms-react/examples/graphql-storybook/gql-storybook-project/gql-storybook-app/node_modules/.cache/sb-vite/deps/@HubSpot_cms-dev-server_storybook.js?v=ec1e5a2c:8000:5>)
    at __require2 (<http://localhost:3123/@fs/home/misa/projects/cms-react/examples/graphql-storybook/gql-storybook-project/gql-storybook-app/node_modules/.cache/sb-vite/deps/chunk-62VDRKYJ.js?v=aa7aaf08:19:50>)
    at node_modules/@babel/types/lib/validators/validate.js (<http://localhost:3123/@fs/home/misa/projects/cms-react/examples/graphql-storybook/gql-storybook-project/gql-storybook-app/node_modules/.cache/sb-vite/deps/@HubSpot_cms-dev-server_storybook.js?v=ec1e5a2c:8035:18>)
    at __require2 (<http://localhost:3123/@fs/home/misa/projects/cms-react/examples/graphql-storybook/gql-storybook-project/gql-storybook-app/node_modules/.cache/sb-vite/deps/chunk-62VDRKYJ.js?v=aa7aaf08:19:50>)
    at node_modules/@babel/types/lib/builders/generated/index.js (<http://localhost:3123/@fs/home/misa/projects/cms-react/examples/graphql-storybook/gql-storybook-project/gql-storybook-app/node_modules/.cache/sb-vite/deps/@HubSpot_cms-dev-server_storybook.js?v=ec1e5a2c:8338:21>)
    at __require2 (<http://localhost:3123/@fs/home/misa/projects/cms-react/examples/graphql-storybook/gql-storybook-project/gql-storybook-app/node_modules/.cache/sb-vite/deps/chunk-62VDRKYJ.js?v=aa7aaf08:19:50>)```
The following is my CLI after `npm run start`:
```
> gql-storybook-app@0.1.0 start
> hs-cms-dev-server . --storybook

Attempting to load HS_* secrets from .env: 
Starting proxy link server on port 1442

HubSpot CMS dev server hosting: gql-storybook-project/gql-storybook-app (at <http://hslocal.net:3000>, hubid=47200733)

Starting storybook server on port 3123
@storybook/cli v7.1.1


attention => Storybook now collects completely anonymous telemetry regarding usage.
This information is used to shape Storybook's roadmap and prioritize features.
You can learn more, including how to opt-out if you'd not like to participate in this anonymous program, by visiting the following URL:
<https://storybook.js.org/telemetry>

info => Starting manager..
WARN unable to find package.json for @HubSpot/local-dev-lib
WARN unable to find package.json for @HubSpot/cms-js-internal
WARN unable to find package.json for copyfiles
WARN unable to find package.json for nodemon
WARN unable to find package.json for publint
WARN unable to find package.json for ts-node
Sourcemap for "/virtual:/@storybook/builder-vite/vite-app.js" points to missing source files
Sourcemap for "/virtual:/@storybook/builder-vite/setup-addons.js" points to missing source files```
Would post this in <#C04AY1H2204|cms-react>  for better visibility.
